Text:
how good is ths for use in a cheap web-server. a webserver that only uses pictures and text. 

no videos!

is debian good for this or is there some other better linux distro that is better at this?

yarrrr

I don't know if I can recommend a good distro for running a slim web server but I'd think you'd want to go with something more tailored to that purpose. Regardless, this will run a decent web server if you configure it correctly.
You can get linux to send you the disk for free or download it for free
